user_story.so_that: deal with annual business of the co-op

whens_list: I go to the Meetings page
I press "Convene an Annual General Meeting"
I choose a date for the meeting
I choose a start time for the meeting
I enter a venue for the meeting
I press "Confirm and convene the meeting"
thens_list: I should see a list of the Directors who are due for retirement
I should see the new AGM in the list of Upcoming Meetings

whens_list: I begin to convene an AGM
I choose to allow electronic nominations for new Directors
I choose a closing date for nominations
thens_list: electronic nominations for new Directors should be opened

whens_list: I begin to convene an AGM
I choose to allow electronic voting for new Directors
I choose a closing date for voting
thens_list: an electronic vote for the new Directors should be prepared
